titleStmt.title: The harmonie of the lawe and the gospel Wherin is plainly shewed, that howsoeuer they differ in time and some other circumstances, yet in substance they are one & the same. And by waie of application, the pretended antiquitie of Poperie is discouered, and found to be a meere nouelty: deliuered in a sermon at Pauls-crosse, the 9. of Aug. 1607. by George Cresvvell, minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Creswell, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. L[ownes] for William Leake,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 6038a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
